data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Barbosa, Felipe Francisco, Fernandes, André Silva, Oliveira, Leandro Gonçalves (2013): Three new species of Macrelmis Motschulsky, 1859 (Coleoptera: Elmidae: Elminae) from the Brazilian Cerrado Biome with updated key for the Macrelmis of Brazil. Zootaxa 3736 (2): 128-142, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3736.2.2
